title: The Spice Emporium and Snack Bar
description: Stockists of spices, dried grains, and packaged vegetarian foods from India and around the world. A outlets in Durban. This one also houses a lacto-vegetarian restaurant which serves Indian chaat snack food. Festive, Indian feel interior with fairy lights, bright colors, and a lively wall of posters. Free Wi-Fi for one hour from Telkom Mobile.
